paper.title: MSQL: A Query Language for Database Mining

author.org: Rutgers University, Department of Computer Science, New Brunswick, NJ 08903 USA. imielins@cs.rutgers.edu#TAB#
Rutgers University, Department of Computer Science, New Brunswick, NJ 08903 USA. avirmani@cs.rutgers.edu#TAB#

paper.abstract: The tremendous number of rules generated in the mining process makes it necessary for any good data mining system to provide for powerful query primitives to post-process the generated rulebase, as well as for performing selective, query based generation. In this paper, we present the design and compilation of MSQL, the rule query language developed as part of the Discovery Board system.
